Dear Parents, Welcome to our latest edition of the Weekly Newsletter. 1.Coffee mornings:- A quick reminder about the Coffee Morning for Key Stage 1 parents (Year1, Year2 and Year3) occurring tomorrow 3rd February at 8:30 – 9:30 in the Lower Campus canteen. Everyone welcome, mum's, dad's… Looking forward to seeing you there! 2. ISM's Got Talent:- Just a reminder that Mr Langford will be receiving applications from students wishing to participate in the talent quest, up until Friday 10th February, 2012 at 3.00pm. 3. Parents Vs Teachers Basketball Challenge:- I hope all the parents are out their shooting some baskets and getting fit......as the second of our challenges is nearing! More news on a date soon...... 4. Lost Property:- We are kindly asking you to label your child(ren)'s clothes and shoes. If the lost items are clearly labelled and we are able to identify them, they are returned to the students/teaching assistants every Wednesday to be sent home with the students. If the items are not labelled, they are stored in the lost and found boxes on both campuses. We would like to remind you that any unclaimed items are donated to local charity at the end of each term, therefore we are kindly asking you to check the lost and found boxes before 30th March .
